subject: Simsonn Content Collaboration!
description_text:
Hi Simsonn Team,


I hope this message finds you well! I’m Dennis Ndukwe, a Digital/UGC
content creator with a unique personality that adds a special touch to my
work. I’ve built an engaged following of 1.2k on Instagram, where my
content averages around 1-2k views per post. One of my standout pieces even
hit over 300k views!


Recently, I had the pleasure of collaborating on a project that really
showcased my creativity and passion. The results were fantastic! I’d love
to see how we can create something similar for Simsonn that resonates with
your audience.


You can check out my work on my Instagram @manlike.dennis
<https://instagram.com/manlike.dennis> for a glimpse of what I can produce.


Do you have any current openings for influencer partnerships? I would be
excited to discuss how we can collaborate!


Thanks,
Dennis Ndukwe
Instagram <https://instagram.com/manlike.dennis>
